title: Can we get more hybrid itemization options as well as hybrid champions?
body: I think hybrid options are lacking in LoL, and that goes for both the itemization as well as the champion options that we have to be able to build hybrid. Right now I think there are only two champions in League that can legitimately build hybrid and be somewhat competitive (Ezrael, Kayle, let me know if I missed someone else)...and I think these options add a new layer to the game and the option to mid items on a single build that we can't do otherwise.

She's a very bad example of what Hybrid Champions are.
